Verses: 1 annaatkalile Pelisdhar Isravelinmel Yuththampanna, Thangal Senaikalaip Porukkuk Koottinaarkal; Appozhudhu Aakees Thaaveedhai Nokki: Neeyum Un Manusharum Evvidhaththilum Ennotekoota Yuththaththukku Varaventum Endru Ariyakkatavaai Endraan.

2 thaaveedhu Aakeesaip Paarththu: Ummutaiya Atiyaan Seyyappokiradhai Neer Nichchayamaai Arindhukolveer Endraan; Appozhudhu Aakees Thaaveedhai Nokki: Idharkaaka Unnai Ennaalum Enakku Meykaavalanaaka Vaippen Endraan.

3 saamuvel Idharku Munname Mariththupponaan; Isravelar Ellaarum Avanukkuth Thukkangontaati, Avan Ooraakiya Raamaavile Avanai Atakkampanninaarkal. Savul Anjanam Paarkkiravarkalaiyum Kurisollukiravarkalaiyum Thesaththil Iraadhapatikkuth Thuraththi Vittaan.
4 pelisdhar Kootivandhu, Soonemile Paalayamiranginaarkal; Savulum Isravelar Ellaaraiyum Koottinaan; Avarkal Kilpovaavile Paalayamiranginaarkal.
5 savul Pelisdharin Paalayaththaik Kantapodhu Payandhaan; Avan Irudhayam Mikavum Thaththaliththukkontirundhadhu.
6 savul Karththaritaththil Visaarikkum Podhu, Karththar Avanukkuch Choppanangalinaalaavadhu, Ooreeminaalaavadhu, Theerkkadharisikalinaalaavadhu Maru Uththaravu Arulavillai.

7 appozhudhu Savul Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Anjanampaarkkira Oru Sdhireeyaith Thetungal; Naan Avalitaththil Poi Visaarippen Endraan; Adharku Avanutaiya Oozhiyakkaarar: Idho, Endhoril Anjanampaarkkira Oru Sdhiree Irukkiraal Endraarkal.

8 appozhudhu Savul Vesham Maari, Veru Vasdhiram Thariththukkontu, Avanum Avanotekoota Irantuperum Iraaththiriyile Andha Sdhireeyinitaththil Poich Cherndhaarkal; Avalai Avan Nokki: Nee Anjanampaarththu Enakkuk Kurisolli, Naan Unnitaththil Sollukiravanai Ezhumpivarachchey Endraan.

9 adharku Andha Sdhiree: Savul Anjanam Paarkkiravarkalaiyum Kurisollukiravarkalaiyum Thesaththil Iraadhapatikku Nirmoolamaakkina Seydhiyai Neer Ariveere; Ennaik Kondrupotumpati Neer En Piraananukkuk Kannivaikkiradhu Enna Endraal.
10 appozhudhu Savul: Indhak Kaariyaththirkaaka Unakkup Pollaappu Varaadhu Enpadhaik Karththarutaiya Jeevanaik Kontu Sollukiren Endru Avalukkukkarththarmel Aanaiyittaan.
11 appozhudhu Andha Sdhiree: Umakku Naan Yaarai Ezhumpivarap Panna Ventum Endradharku, Avan: Saamuvelai Ezhumpivarappannaventum Endraan.
12 andha Sdhiree Saamuvelaik Kantamaaththiraththil Makaa Saththamaaik Kooppittu, Savulai Nokki: En Ennai Mosampokkineer? Neerdhaan Savulaachchudhe Endraal.
13 raajaa Avalaip Paarththu: Nee Payappataadhe; Nee Kaankiradhu Enna Endru Kettaan. Adharku Andha Sdhiree: Thevarkal Poomikkullirundhu Erivarukiradhaik Kaankiren Endru Savulukkuch Chonnaal.

14 avarutaiya Roopam Enna Endru Avalaik Kettaan. Adharku Aval: Saalvaiyaip Porththukkontirukkira Oru Mudhirndha Vayadhaana Manushan Ezhumpivarukiraan Endraal: Adhinaale Savul Avan Saamuvel Endru Arindhukontu, Tharaimattum Mukangunindhu Vananginaan.

15 saamuvel Savulai Nokki: Nee Ennai Ezhumpivarappanni, Ennaik Kalaiththadhu Enna Endru Kettaan. Adharkuch Chavul: Naan Mikavum Nerukkappattirukkiren; Pelisdhar Enakku Virodhamaai Yuththampannukiraarkal; Thevanum Ennaik Kaivittaar; Avar Theerkkadharisikalinaalaavadhu, Soppanangalinaalaavadhu Enakku Maru Uththaravu Arulukiradhillai; Aakaiyaal Naan Seyyaventiyadhai Neer Enakku Arivikkumpatikku, Ummai Azhaippiththen Endraan.
16 adharkuch Chaamuvel: Karththar Unnaivittu Vilaki, Unakkuch Chaththuruvaai Irukkumpodhu, Nee Ennitaththil Ketpaanen?
17 karththar Ennaikkontu Sonnapatiye Seydhu Mutiththu, Raajyaththai Un Kaiyilirundhu Pariththu, Adhai Un Thozhanaakiya Thaaveedhukkuk Kotuththuvittaar.
18 nee Karththarutaiya Sorkelaamalum, Amalekkinmel Avarukku Irundha Kopaththin Ukkiraththaith Theerkkaamalum Ponapatiyinaal, Karththar Indraiya Thinam Unakku Indhap Pirakaaramaakach Cheydhaar.

19 karththar Unnutaiya Janamaakiya Isravelaraiyum Pelisdhar Kaiyil Oppukkotuppaar; Naalaikku Neeyum Un Kumaararum Ennotiruppeerkal; Isravelin Paalayaththaiyum Karththar Pelisdharin Kaiyil Oppukkotuppaar Endraan.

20 andhakshaname Savul Netidhaangitaiyaaith Tharaiyile Vizhundhu, Saamuvelin Vaarththaikalinaale Mikavum Payappattaan; Avan Iraappakal Muzhudhum Ondrum Saappitaadhirundhapatiyinaal, Avan Palaveenamaayirundhaan.

21 appozhudhu Andha Sdhiree Savulitaththil Vandhu, Avan Mikavum Kalangiyirukkiradhaik Kantu, Avanai Nokki: Idho, Ummutaiya Atiyaalaakiya Naan Ummutaiya Sorkettu, En Piraananai En Kaiyile Pitiththukkontu, Neer Enakkuch Chonna Ummutaiya Vaarththaikalukkuk Keezhppatindhen.
22 ippozhudhu Neer Ummutaiya Atiyaalutaiya Sollaik Kelum, Naan Umakku Munpaakak Konjam Appam Vaikkiren, Adhaip Pusippeeraaka, Appozhudhu Neer Vazhinatandhu Pokaththakka Pelan Umakkul Irukkum Endraal.

23 avano Thattudhalpanni, Naan Pusikkamaatten Endraan; Aanaalum Avanutaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Andha Sdhireeyum Avanai Mikavum Varundhikkontadhinaal, Avan Avarkal Sorkettu, Tharaiyilirundhu Ezhundhirundhu Kattilin Mel Utkaarndhaan.
24 andha Sdhireeyinitaththil Kozhuththakandrukkutti Ondru Veettil Irundhadhu; Adhaith Theeviramaai Atiththu, Maa Etuththup Pisaindhu, Adhaip Pulippillaa Appangalaakach Chuttu,
25 savulukkum Avan Oozhiyakkaararukkum Munpaakak Kontuvandhu Vaiththaal; Avarkal Pusiththu Ezhundhirundhu, Andha Iraaththiriyileye Purappattup Ponaarkal.
